entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow in the Natuashish area. Amount 5 cm in the Natuashish area. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow ending before morning then cloudy. Blowing snow overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 80 near midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Tuesday 17 January 2023
